metadata.title: CVE-2013-6389 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Overlay module in Drupal 7.x before 7.24allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.24-1').
